verses.name: Matthew 20:14
verses.text: Take that thine is, and go thy way: I will give unto this last, even as unto thee.

verses.name: Matthew 20:15
verses.text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own? Is thine eye evil, because I am good?

verses.name: Matthew 20:16
verses.text: So the last shall be first, and the first last: for many be called, but few chosen.

verses.name: Matthew 20:17
verses.text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way, and said unto them,
